responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in Error Messages
    analysis: |
      The provided code includes generic error pages (404, 422, 500) that instruct the user to "check the logs for more information." 
      If the application is configured to log errors with detailed stack traces or other sensitive data, these error messages could inadvertently expose this information to unauthorized users.
    cwe: CWE-209
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - public/500.html
      - public/422.html
      - public/404.html
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in Error Messages
leads.analysis:
The provided code includes generic error pages (404, 422, 500) that instruct the user to "check the logs for more information." 
If the application is configured to log errors with detailed stack traces or other sensitive data, these error messages could inadvertently expose this information to unauthorized users.
